mapper.insert: Insert INTO actuality_eating(id, ae_diettype, ae_foodname) Values(#{id}, #{ae_diettype}, #{ae_foodname})
mapper.select: SELECT ae.ae_diettype, SUM(fl.calory) AS total_calory, SUM(fl.carbohydrate) AS total_carbohydrate, SUM(fl.protein) AS total_protein, SUM(fl.fat) AS total_fat, SUM(fl.sodium) AS total_sodium, SUM(fl.cholesterol) AS total_cholesterol FROM actuality_eating ae JOIN foodlist fl ON INSTR(',' || ae.ae_foodname || ',', ',' || fl.foodname || ',') > 0 WHERE ae.id = #{id} AND TO_CHAR(ae.ae_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY ae.ae_diettype ORDER BY CASE WHEN ae.ae_diettype = '아침' THEN 1 WHEN ae.ae_diettype = '점심' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END
SELECT count(*) FROM actuality_eating WHERE id = #{id} And TO_CHAR(ae_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ae_dietType = #{ae_diettype}
mapper.update: UPDATE actuality_eating SET ae_foodname = #{ae_foodname} WHERE id = #{id} and ae_diettype = #{ae_diettype} And TO_CHAR(ae_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
